data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Chief Financial Officer (CFO)
data.news_body: In continuation of our letter dated 06.02.2026 regarding resignation of Mr. V Srinivasan Chief Financial Officer of the Company we wish to inform you that we have inadvertently mentioned the effective date of resignation as 06.02.2026 instead of 09.02.2026. We hereby clarify that other than the above there are no other changes in the information previously submitted.
